feed.subtitle: We develop computational modeling to simulate energy/bio soft materials system

entry.title: Seonghyeon wins the best poster award at Nano Korea 2024 symposium!

link.title: Seonghyeon wins the best poster award at Nano Korea 2024 symposium!

entry.content: Seonghyeon’s poster presentation “Effects of Energetic Disorder in Doped Conducting Polymer: Molecular Dynamics and Monte Carlo Study” won a silver award at the Nano Korea 2024 Symposium! Congratulations, Seonghyeon!
entry.summary: Seonghyeon’s poster presentation “Effects of Energetic Disorder in Doped Conducting Polymer: Molecular Dynamics and Monte Carlo Study” won a silver award at the Nano Korea 2024 Symposium! Congratulations, Seonghyeon!

entry.title: Welcome to our News Page!
entry.content: We’ll be sharing the latest lab news here. Check back regularly to see what we are up to!
